title.narrative: Enhancing the Capacities of Human Rights Defenders

description.narrative: The “Enhancing the capacities of Human Rights Defenders for improved human rights situation in Sierra Leone’’ project inSierra Leone implemented by Human Rights Defenders Network Sierra Leone aims to strengthen district-based human rights defenders by providing them the required tools to monitor and respond to human rights issues at local levels. The project objective is to continue strengthening the capacity of the broad network of Human Right Defenders (HRDs) for improved human rights situation. The key activities include citizen’s engagement on their civic rights, responsibilities, privileges and limitations production and dissemination of IEC materials. HRDNSL will also intensify human rights advocacy, policy engagement, build on national human rights mechanisms and strengthen local structures.
